extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://dtd.nlm.nih.gov/, http://dtd.nlm.nih.gov/tag-library/1.1/index.html, http://dtd.nlm.nih.gov/1.0/, http://dtd.nlm.nih.gov/1.1/</field><field name="filenameExtension">xml</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: An XML-based specification for journal articles, developed by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI), a division of the National Library of Medicine (NLM) and intended as a common format in which publishers and archives can exchange final journal content.
name: NCBI/NLM Journal Archiving and Interchange Document Type Definition (DTD), version 1.0 and 1.1
